name: Entitled Kaiju Game
description:
Kid Kaiju is hungry! And lazy! 

As an extremely responsible Parentzilla you set out to pick some nutritious skyscrapers and atomic plants in the city and throw them directly into your baby's mouth!

  • Feed Kid Kaiju to keep your baby happy!
  • Pick up buildings, aim and throw them directly into your bebe's mouth across the city
  • Different facilities have different nutrition values (hint: atomic plants fill your little one up quickly)
  • Fully destructible city!

############

Controls 

[WASD / STICKS] Directions
[LEFT MOUSE / A Button] Pick UP + Throw

############
